Description of incident: CheckFree Corp. and some of the              banks that use its electronic bill payment service say that criminals              took control of several of the company's Internet domains and redirected              customer traffic to a malicious Web site hosted in the Ukraine. The              company believes that about 160,000 consumers were exposed to the              Ukrainian attack site. However, because the company lost control of              its Web domains, it doesn't know exactly who was hit. It has warned a much larger number of customers. This breach was reported back              in Dec. 3, 2008.
